overview: A fresh new litter of school boys are back for another sleepover, and this time there’s no shame. Any group of boys can get experimental during a slumber party, but ours get downright hardcore. Red hot Helix Studios Exclusives Kyle Ross and Luke Allen bring their hungry holes to the party. The hung studs Christian Collins and Eric Blaine take the ferocious fucking and sloppy sucking to another level of perversion. Lock the bedroom door because you’re invited to stay over with Slumber Party Boys 2.
title: Slumber Party Boys 2
